title: Scene 1: Realization
text:
You sit with your bleeding hand. The tablet is still glowing faintly. A UI prompt flickers: 'Please confirm your reason for admission: anxiety, psychosis, malingering, or other.'

You try to hit the back arrow. It reboots.

This isn't just a bad interface. It's the entire system. Glitched. Cracked. Uncaring. And it's already rewriting your narrative.

You realize that the form was never meant to help. It was meant to label. To log you in and lock you down.

choices.result: The screen freezes. You’re logged in as someone else.

choices.text: Throw the tablet to the floor.
choices.result: Security is called. You are marked as 'escalated'.
You inhale slowly. The system won’t win.
